Keywords: Avengers , Past , Soldier , Wakanda
Real Name: Steve Rogers
Special Powers
THE AVENGERS INITIATIVE: Captain America has the Avengers team ability.
JUST WAITING FOR AN OPENING: Close Combat Expert. // FREE: Make a close attack.
WHILE THE REAL BLACK PANTHER WAS IN WAKANDA: SIDELINE ACTIVE - When a friendly character named Black Panther of 50 points or more is KO'd, you may generate Captain America from your Sideline into the square that Black Panther last occupied on click #1.

December 17, 2021
Fookilla
Quick correction: Legacy cards are not just for figures from the earliest, non-carded sets - they have done some for carded figures, too. Mainly, they're a way for older figs to be "legal" in contemporary games.
December 17, 2021
Fookilla
@RageFueledKitty you're totally right, but it appears you are misunderstanding the new game mechanic of "Legacy" cards. Basically, they're ways to allow old figures (pre-card) in contemporary games. So instead of wiz kids doing new "Oreo" bases with old molds, the cards add things like traits and SPs that are endemic to modern age games. I wondered about them too, as the prices of pre-card figs on eBay were spiking. Also, I am impressed with your knowledge of old pieces. There's no way I could eyeball the dial on my old stuff and identify the figure. Nicely done!
